com.powervision.powersdk.listener

接口 MountDeviceListener.UartListener

  • 封闭类:
    MountDeviceListener

    public static interface MountDeviceListener.UartListener
    Callbacks related to UART.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onUartDataAskSend(int state, int error)
      Send callbacks of data.
      void onUartDataReceive(MountData data)
      Receive data
      void onUartParamInquire(int bps, int dataBits, int stopBits, int parity, int flowCtrl, int state)
      Query parameters
      void onUartParamSet(int state, int error)
      Set callbacks of parameters

    • 方法详细资料

      • onUartParamSet

        void onUartParamSet(int state,
                    int error)
        Set callbacks of parameters
        参数:
        state - 0，success
        error - error mode

      • onUartParamInquire

        void onUartParamInquire(int bps,
                        int dataBits,
                        int stopBits,
                        int parity,
                        int flowCtrl,
                        int state)
        Query parameters
        参数:
        bps - Baudrate 0:9600 1:14400 2:19200 3:38400 4:57600 5:115200
        dataBits - Data bits 0:8位 1:9位
        stopBits - Stop bits0:1位 1:2位
        parity - Verify 0:No verification 1: odd parity check2:even parity check
        flowCtrl - Fluid control0:No fluid control 1:RTS is effective 2:CTS is effective 3:RTS和CTS are effective at the same time
        state -

      • onUartDataAskSend

        void onUartDataAskSend(int state,
                       int error)
        Send callbacks of data.
        参数:
        state - 0， success
        error - error mode

      • onUartDataReceive

        void onUartDataReceive(MountData data)
        Receive data
        参数:
        data -
        另请参阅:
        MountData
